description: This file contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for notes, including request DTOs for creating and updating notes, and a response DTO for note details.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: Request DTO for creating a new note with a title and content.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: Request DTO for updating an existing note's title and content.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: Response DTO representing a note with Id, Title, Content, and timestamps.
